attributes.action: The UK should rejoin the EU’s Horizon research programme
attributes.additional_details: The UK will find it extremely difficult to be an effective research power if it is not part of the European research network
attributes.background: Rejoin the EU’s €95.5bn Horizon research programme as soon as possible

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The UK Government has said it has been pushing the EU to implement the UK’s association to Horizon Europe, but that EU has continued to delay UK association: https://questions-statements.parliament.uk/written-questions/detail/2023-02-06/140168

It's therefore not clear what additional action you want the UK Government to take.
